      • PlayerInputs

        public PlayerInputs(jmcc.MicrocontrollerConnection mc,
            int servoFramesPerSecond,
            int cyclesPerSecond)
             throws Exception
        Pre-packaged settings for an AnimatronicsShowPlayer
        Parameters:
        mc - a MicrocontrollerConnection
        servoFramesPerSecond - recommended 30fps, cannot be 0
        cyclesPerSecond - Can't be 0 and must be > servoFramesPerSecond and > audioBytesPerSecond (176400)
        Throws:
        Exception
